title: Thunderbird marking ALL email as Spam
content: Currently running Windows 10 and Thunderbird 115.5.0 (64-bit). All new email coming into my Thunderbird inbox from my gmail account is being marked as Spam, red flame. But is left in the inbox. Earlier in the day I went to Tools > Settings > Privacy & Security and selected "Reset Training Data" thinking that might be how/why things were getting marked as spam. Several hours later I have 7 new messages, all marked as spam. I to Gmail's web interface and the messages are all there and none are marked as spam. I checked the Log of Junk mail and I do not see any of the subject lines there.
creator: paul.truzzi

title: When I try to send an email i get this error message -
content:
When I try to send an email i get this error message,

sending of message failed. cannot communicate securely with peer no common encryption algorithm. The configuration related to mail.look.ca must be corrected.

I have no idea how to correct this and have already installed the latest version of Thunderbird.

Thanks
creator: halder

title: Thunderbird message pane background color
content:
Hello,

I played a while with the developer tools for thunderbird but up until now I'm not able to change anything for the message pane.

I would like to tweak the background color and some margins but even if I put a change on the element the change is completely ignored/overwritten. Google was not able to point me in the right direction either...

How can I do this? Or why seems this not to be possible? A link to a working solution/tutorial would be much appreciated.

Regards

wKovacs
creator: w.kovacs112358
